// WARN: This file is auto generated by flood-tide-gen
match CmdOp::from(nv.opt.num) {
    CmdOp::Number => {
        conf.flg_number = true;
    }
    CmdOp::FileName => {
        conf.flg_file_name = true;
    }
    CmdOp::PathName => {
        conf.flg_path_name = true;
    }
    CmdOp::PipeIn => {
        conf.opt_pipe_in = value_to_string(nv)?;
    }
    CmdOp::Help => {
        conf.flg_help = true;
    }
    CmdOp::Version => {
        conf.flg_version = true;
    }
}
